page.title: 01Filey and Gristhorpe.
page.content: Apart from the town of Filey and the small village of Gristhorpe the area is totally farmland.The main road to Hull,the A165,and the railway line between Scarborough and Hull bisect the block. Filey has grown from a small fishing village into a bustling holiday resort with a range of accomodation to suit all tastes.The town evolved around it's 12th century church which has been the focal point for the fishing community. Gristhorpe is a very small village which has seen a lot of new housing development.{Dale Electric}has established itself as a leading manufacturer of generators.
